heroSubTitle: Connect with your team instantly. Start or join a room to make your daily standups more efficient.
featureMessage2: Keep your standups focused and productive with built-in timers and prompts.
featureMessage4: Connect seamlessly with your team members, no matter where they are.
featureMessage6: Monitor team progress and identify blockers in real-time.
aboutUsMessage: Making agile meetings more efficient and productive for teams worldwide
